name: MAA Gifter
short_description:
Marvel Avengers Alliance is a really fun game!

Unfortunately, the meta game and social aspects of the game leave something to be desired.

The game was originally designed for Facebook, but it was eventually migrated over to Playdom.com, and a strangely haphazard social media element was created to act as a wrapper for the game.

As such, the guild identity and the inter-guild competition leaves much to be desired.

In particular, the gifting mechanism seems strangely lacking, in that you can't really track your most active friends and you are unable to fully maximize the gifting mechanic.

This project aims to rectify that by providing an external app that will provide detailed statistics about your allies, and how many gifts you've exchanged over the course of a day, a week, a month, or even a year.  It will also allow you to create friend profiles that will eventually allow you to automate the hourly gifting process.
summary: Gifting Utility and Statistics for Marvel Avengers Alliance
